required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Environmental Factors Between the Areas of Over- and Under-incidence of Crohn's Disease in the Haut de France Region, by the Study of Dental Exposomes
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Environmental Factors Between the Areas of Over- and Under-incidence of Crohn's Disease in the Haut de France Region, by the Study of Dental Exposomes

brief_summary.textblock: the aim of this preliminary observational study is to compare external exposomes from 10 teeth issued through 10 subjects living in high incidence of crohn's disease area and 10 teeth issued through 10 subjects living in low incidence of crohn's disease area.

primary_outcome.measure: comparison of aluminum rate using metabolomic method in teeth between subjects living in high and low incidence crohn's disease areas.

secondary_outcome.measure: comparison of environmental exposomes using metabolomic method in teeth between subjects living in high and low incidence crohn's disease areas.

arm_group.description: subjects living in high incidence crohn's disease area coming in dentist for dental extraction linked to medical indication
subjects living in low incidence crohn's disease area coming in dentist for dental extractionlinked to medical indication

study_pop.textblock: adults subjects living in high and low incidence of crohn's disease areas and needing a dental extraction for medical indication.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- adults subjects living in high and low incidence of crohn's disease areas and needing a dental extraction for medical indication
Exclusion Criteria:
- smokers during 10 last years
